pr_title: add fix to handle functions applied to literal

timeline.message: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/rupal-bq/sql into sql-having-clause-issue

timeline.bodyText: I think we need to check this recursively, ex. ABS(ABS(age)). Could we merge isNonLiteral() to this method as base case for recursion?
timeline.author: dai-chen

timeline.bodyText: Could you add some more test queries as comparison test for this issue in https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/sql/tree/develop/integ-test/src/test/resources/correctness/bugfixes
timeline.author: dai-chen

replies.bodyText: Sure, I will add queries without the date function.
replies.author: rupal-bq

replies.bodyText: I added a few tests in comparison but while testing function without input PI() the results returned but another database was different (3.15 instead of 3.141592653589793) so I added manual IT for this.
replies.author: rupal-bq

timeline.message: remove unnecessary check. anyMatch returns false for empty list.
